name: ivasms-telegram-bot
description: IVASMS OTP forwarder to Telegram using cookies in ENV

ADMIN_CHAT_IDS.description: Comma separated Telegram user IDs of bot admins

COOKIES_NT.description: Netscape cookie file content exported from browser (multiline)

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection URI (optional, leave empty for JSON fallback)

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Bot deployed. Make sure YOUR_BOT_TOKEN and COOKIES_NT are set!'
